updates.HtmlString: Double-faced cards upgraded to new version.
Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and staring with this set, it always replaces a common.
Reimported all cards. Now only one double-faced card (plus maybe foil) per booster.
Fixed double-faced card rarities and they can now be foil.
Redid boosters according to actual layout. Double-faced cards only appear in a single slot.
Double-Faced now replaced common. No duplicates allowed. Works in Firefox. (Thanks, Mike!)

createdText: (yes, the day before the Innistrad Prerelease)
